description: A farm in Maine is welcoming over 50 baby goats this month and will allow people to meet them in person every weekend through Mother's Day.
maintext: A farm in Cumberland, Maine is welcoming over 50 baby goats this month and will allow people to meet them in person every weekend through Mother's Day.Sunflower Farm Creamery will be open to the public for anyone who might enjoy "cuddling a kid."for more information and to see the goats in action on from a live camera.for more stories and videos about animals.
title: VIDEO: Farm in Maine welcomes dozens of baby goats
